meanings.definition: A toothed wheel that meshes with another toothed wheel to transmit motion.
meanings.sent1: The gearwheels in the clock work together to make the hands move.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the gearwheels in the engine to ensure smooth operation.
meanings.sent3: The gearwheels in the robot danced together, creating a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a set of gearwheels, each thought turning the next.
meanings.sent5: The gearwheels on the bike spun rapidly, propelling the rider forward.

meanings.definition: A mechanical device consisting of interconnected gearwheels.
meanings.sent1: The old clock tower had intricate gearwheels that fascinated visitors.
meanings.sent2: The factory used a complex system of gearwheels to automate production.
meanings.sent3: The gearwheels in the toy car seemed to have a mind of their own, moving unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like a set of gearwheels, each relying on the other to function smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The gearwheels of the lock clicked into place, securing the door tightly.
